pullrequest.title: Make libignition-msgs-dev to Depend on protobuf-compiler and protoc

content.raw: Debian usually solves these situation by using `Recommends` instead of `Depends`. Most of the package managers will install the `Recommends` by default without asking but you can avoid them if your try to get a minimal installation. [https://www.debian.org/doc/manuals/maint-guide/dreq.en.html](https://www.debian.org/doc/manuals/maint-guide/dreq.en.html). I will modify the debs for the next release and change them in debian.
